story:
Once upon a time, in the ancient land of Iraq, there lived a young boy named Ali. Ali was a brave and kind-hearted boy who loved to explore the world around him. One day, he set out on an adventure to the magical Garden of Dreams, a place where dreams come to life.

As Ali ventured through the enchanted garden, he encountered a wise old owl perched on a tree branch. The owl shared with Ali the importance of kindness, bravery, and helping others in need. Inspired by the owl's words, Ali decided to embark on a quest to help those in his village who were in trouble.

Ali's first stop was at the house of an elderly woman who needed help tending to her garden. With a heart full of compassion, Ali worked tirelessly to weed, plant, and water the woman's garden until it blossomed with colorful flowers and delicious fruits.

Next, Ali heard about a lost lamb in the nearby forest and immediately set out to find it. Through his cleverness and determination, Ali safely guided the lost lamb back to its mother, who showered him with gratitude and blessings.

As night fell, Ali returned home to his own family, feeling fulfilled and happy from his day of helping others. His parents tucked him into bed and listened as Ali shared his adventures in the Garden of Dreams.

And so, as Ali drifted off to sleep, he knew that the true magic of the world lay not in the fantastical garden, but in the kindness and compassion that he shared with others each day.

As the stars twinkled in the night sky and the moon watched over him, Ali fell into a peaceful slumber, knowing that tomorrow would bring new adventures and opportunities to make the world a better place. And so, the tale of Ali, the brave and kind-hearted boy, continues on in the hearts of all who hear his story.

The end. Good night, little one. Sleep tight and dream sweet dreams.
